铋的氧化物以Bi₂O₃最重要，有α（单斜）、β（四方）、γ（体心立方）等晶型，颜色从黄到红棕变化，碱性为主，难溶于水，溶于酸生成Bi³⁺盐，不溶于碱。Bi₂O₃是重要黄色颜料、陶瓷釉料和氧化锆固态电解质添加剂。五氧化二铋（Bi₂O₅）为红棕色，强氧化剂，易分解。混合价态氧化物如Bi₂O₄（实为BiⅢBiⅤO₄）用于氧化反应催化剂。

铋(III)盐易水解，生成碱式盐沉淀（如BiOCl、BiONO₃），配制时需加相应酸抑制。Bi³⁺为硬酸，倾向与含氧配体结合，其硝酸盐（Bi(NO₃)₃·5H₂O）是常用原料。铋的卤化物中，BiF₃为离子型难溶固体，BiCl₃为共价型易水解固体（熔点230 °C），溶于盐酸形成BiCl₄⁻等络离子。有机铋化合物（如三苯基铋）较砷、锑类似物稳定。

铋(V)化合物罕见且强氧化性，如NaBiO₃（铋酸钠）为棕黄色固体，不溶于水，在酸性介质中为强氧化剂（E°(BiO₃⁻/Bi³⁺)≈1.6 V），可氧化Mn²⁺至MnO₄⁻（分析化学定性锰）。BiF₅为无色固体，强氟化剂。

铋在医药中历史悠久：次水杨酸铋（Pepto-Bismol）用于胃溃疡和腹泻；铋剂（如枸橼酸铋钾）用于幽门螺杆菌根除三联疗法（保护黏膜、抑制菌酶）。放射性²¹⁰Bi（半衰期5天）用于靶向α治疗（癌症）。铋合金（如伍德合金，熔点约70 °C）用于保险丝、模具和辐射屏蔽。铋基钙钛矿（如Cs₃Bi₂I₉）是潜在无铅光伏材料。铋碲合金（Bi₂Te₃）是常用热电材料（温差发电与制冷）。

铋毒性极低，但长期摄入可致肾损伤（可逆）。铋脑病（罕见，与铋剂滥用相关）表现为震颤、认知障碍。环境中铋污染少，主要来自冶炼副产品。

properties.summary: Polonium is a chemical element with symbol Po and atomic number 84, discovered in 1898 by Marie Curie and Pierre Curie. A rare and highly radioactive element with no stable isotopes, polonium is chemically similar to bismuth and tellurium, and it occurs in uranium ores. Applications of polonium are few.
properties.extension:
钋作为第六主族唯一的天然放射性元素（铀-镭系衰变产物），其化学研究受限于强放射性和极低丰度，但展现出显著的金属性和+2氧化态的稳定性（惰性电子对效应极致）。钋原子半径167 pm（金属半径），第一电离能812 kJ/mol，电负性2.0（估计值），性质为金属，其化学行为更接近同周期铂族金属而非氧族元素。钋的电子构型为[Xe]4f¹⁴5d¹⁰6s²6p⁴，6s²电子对高度惰性，故+2氧化态（Po²⁺）最稳定，+4态（Po⁴⁺）也存在，+6态罕见。

钋-210（²¹⁰Po，半衰期138.4天）是最易获得同位素，α辐射体（5.3 MeV），比活度高（1 mg Po每秒释放1.4×10¹¹ α粒子），剧毒（μg级可致命）。钋单质为银白色金属，熔点254 °C，沸点962 °C，低蒸气压，具高α粒子发射率。在空气中缓慢氧化生成PoO₂，加热迅速氧化。溶于稀酸生成Po²⁺（粉红色），易被氧化为Po⁴⁺（黄色）。与卤素直接反应生成PoX₂、PoX₄。

钋的氢化物钋化氢（PoH₂）可能存在，但极不稳定，研究极少。

钋的氧化物中，二氧化钋（PoO₂）为黄色固体（氟石结构），加热变黑，难溶于酸和碱。一氧化钋（PoO）可能存在但未确认。钋酸盐（如Na₂PoO₄）已知但不稳定。

钋的卤化物如PoCl₂（紫色）、PoCl₄（黄色，易升华）、PoBr₂（暗红色）、PoBr₄（红色）等，其+2价卤化物离子性较强，+4价共价性明显。Po(IV)易形成络阴离子（如[PoCl₆]²⁻）。

钋的主要应用基于其强α辐射：作为α粒子源用于静电消除（工业除尘）、中子触发剂（与铍混合）和航天器热电源（⁵⁸Po热源）。历史曾用于原子电池和放射性发光涂料。

钋的毒性主要来自辐射损伤（内照射），化学毒性亦强（似铊）。环境中钋极微量，主要来自铀矿、烟草（⁵¹⁰Po积聚于烟叶）和工业事故。著名案例：2006年亚历山大·利特维年科钋-210中毒事件。

properties.summary: Astatine is a very rare radioactive chemical element with the chemical symbol At and atomic number 85. It occurs on Earth as the decay product of various heavier elements. All its isotopes are short-lived; the most stable is astatine-210, with a half-life of 8.1 hours.
properties.extension:
砹作为卤素唯一的放射性元素（天然同位素均为铀、钍衰变系产物），其化学研究受限于极低丰度（地壳中约25克）和短半衰期（最稳定²¹⁰At仅8.1小时），但理论预测及微量实验揭示其介于碘与钋之间的金属性过渡行为。砹原子半径约150 pm（估算），第一电离能约890 kJ/mol，电负性2.2，其6s²电子对显现惰性，故+1氧化态（At⁺）可能稳定，+7态难存在。

砹单质推测为黑色固体，熔点约302 °C，沸点约337 °C（可能升华）。化学行为类似碘：可形成At₂分子、HAt（氢砹酸，强酸）、At⁻离子及多砹阴离子（如At₃⁻）。砹易被氧化为AtO⁻、AtO₃⁻等含氧阴离子，亦可能形成有机砹化合物（如CH₃At）。因α衰变释放能量，微量砹即产生显著辐射化学效应。

砹-211（²¹¹At，半衰期7.2小时）是潜在靶向α治疗核素，其衰变释放α粒子（约5.9 MeV）杀伤癌细胞，但制备分离极难。砹毒性主要来自辐射，化学毒性类似碘。

properties.summary: Radon is a chemical element with symbol Rn and atomic number 86. It is a radioactive, colorless, odorless, tasteless noble gas, occurring naturally as a decay product of radium. Its most stable isotope, 222Rn, has a half-life of 3.8 days.

Francium is a chemical element with symbol Fr and atomic number 87. It used to be known as eka-caesium and actinium K. It is the second-least electronegative element, behind only caesium. Francium is a highly radioactive metal that decays into astatine, radium, and radon.
properties.extension: 钫是放射性元素，自然界中由Ac-227衰变产生，半衰期短（最稳定同位素Fr-223半衰期仅22分钟）。因其极不稳定，化学性质研究多通过示踪法进行。理论预测其性质与铯类似，但金属性可能更强，与水反应预计极为剧烈。

properties.summary: Radium is a chemical element with symbol Ra and atomic number 88. It is the sixth element in group 2 of the periodic table, also known as the alkaline earth metals. Pure radium is almost colorless, but it readily combines with nitrogen (rather than oxygen) on exposure to air, forming a black surface layer of radium nitride (Ra3N2).

Actinium is a radioactive chemical element with symbol Ac (not to be confused with the abbreviation for an acetyl group) and atomic number 89, which was discovered in 1899. It was the first non-primordial radioactive element to be isolated. Polonium, radium and radon were observed before actinium, but they were not isolated until 1902.
properties.extension:
锕系元素（Ac-Lr，原子序数89-103）位于第七周期，紧随镧系之后，其电子填充于5f轨道，构成了第二个f区系列。与镧系相似，锕系元素也呈现稳定的+3氧化态，但锕系元素的化学行为更为复杂多变：其5f轨道能量与6d轨道更为接近，导致更高氧化态（可达+7）更易出现，且金属性、离子半径与配位行为展现出更明显的过渡性特征。几乎所有锕系元素均具放射性，其研究始终与核科学、放射化学与国家安全紧密相连。

总体特征：锕系元素的电子构型为Rn5fⁿ6dⁿ’7s²，其中n=0-14，但5f与6d能级交错明显，导致电子排布规律不如镧系整齐。随着原子序数增加，离子半径同样发生“锕系收缩”，但收缩幅度较镧系更平缓。锕系离子（尤以An³⁺、An⁴⁺为代表）颜色丰富，源自5f电子跃迁；其配位数常高于镧系（可达12），且对“软”配体（如Cl⁻、S²⁻）亲和力更强，共价成分更显著。

锕系元素的放射性是其最突出性质。除钍、铀外，其余元素在自然界中仅以痕量存在（主要来自铀、钍衰变链），大部分须通过人工核反应合成。其放射性类型多样（α、β、γ、自发裂变），半衰期跨度极大（从钍-232的140亿年到某些超锕元素的毫秒级），使得研究与应用均需严格辐射防护。

提取、分离与应用：钍、铀是唯一天然丰度较高的锕系元素，其提取主要从独居石、沥青铀矿等矿物中进行。后处理与分离技术（如用于核燃料再处理的PUREX流程）依赖溶剂萃取（TBP/煤油体系）与离子交换，依据不同氧化态下配合物稳定性差异实现分离。主要应用领域包括：

核能与核武：铀-235、钚-239是裂变反应堆与核武器核心燃料；钍-232是可增殖核燃料（经中子照射转化为铀-233）；锔-244、锎-252等是紧凑型中子源，用于反应堆启动、材料检测与癌症治疗。

放射性同位素：镅-241用于烟雾探测器与厚度计；钚-238用于航天器同位素热电机（RTG）；铀、钍系同位素用于地质测年（如U-Pb法、Th-Pb法）。

材料科学：贫铀（主要为U-238）用于穿甲弹与配重块；某些锕系化合物具超导或重费米子行为（如UBe₁₃）。

基础研究：超锕元素的合成与性质研究是核物理与化学前沿，用于检验核壳模型与探索“稳定岛”。

89. 锕 Ac：锕是锕系首元，电子构型[Rn]6d¹7s²，无5f电子。Ac³⁺（5f⁰）半径最大（112 pm），化学性质极似镧，但碱性略强。²²⁷Ac（半衰期21.8年）是铀-235衰变子体，可用于α辐射源，但分离困难，应用有限。

properties.summary: Thorium is a chemical element with symbol Th and atomic number 90. A radioactive actinide metal, thorium is one of only two significantly radioactive elements that still occur naturally in large quantities as a primordial element (the other being uranium). It was discovered in 1828 by the Norwegian Reverend and amateur mineralogist Morten Thrane Esmark and identified by the Swedish chemist Jöns Jakob Berzelius, who named it after Thor, the Norse god of thunder.
properties.extension: 90. 钍 Th：钍以+4氧化态最稳定（Th⁴⁺，5f⁰，无色），其化学行为类似锆、铪。ThO₂（方钍石）是高熔点氧化物（熔点3390 °C），曾用于燃气灯罩；钍钨电极用于氩弧焊。钍是潜在核燃料（Th-232→U-233），但需快中子或热中子增殖堆配套。

properties.summary: Protactinium is a chemical element with symbol Pa and atomic number 91. It is a dense, silvery-gray metal which readily reacts with oxygen, water vapor and inorganic acids. It forms various chemical compounds where protactinium is usually present in the oxidation state +5, but can also assume +4 and even +2 or +3 states.
properties.extension: 91. 镤 Pa：镤是最早发现的锕系元素之一，常见氧化态为+5（Pa⁵⁺，5f⁰，无色）与+4（Pa⁴⁺，5f¹，黄褐色）。Pa(V)易水解聚合，形成复杂多核离子。其化学研究受制于高放射性与稀缺性，主要作为铀提取副产品。

properties.summary: Uranium is a chemical element with symbol U and atomic number 92. It is a silvery-white metal in the actinide series of the periodic table. A uranium atom has 92 protons and 92 electrons, of which 6 are valence electrons.
properties.extension: 92. 铀 U：铀是锕系中最为人知的元素，氧化态多样（+3至+6），其中+6（UO₂²⁺，黄绿色）与+4（U⁴⁺，绿色）最常见。UO₂²⁺（铀酰离子）为直线型，可形成稳定配合物（如UO₂(NO₃)₂·6H₂O）。天然铀含99.27% U-238与0.72% U-235，后者是唯一天然易裂变核素。主要用途：核反应堆燃料（浓缩铀或天然铀）、贫铀穿甲弹、玻璃着色剂（铀玻璃呈荧光绿）。

properties.summary: Neptunium is a chemical element with symbol Np and atomic number 93. A radioactive actinide metal, neptunium is the first transuranic element. Its position in the periodic table just after uranium, named after the planet Uranus, led to it being named after Neptune, the next planet beyond Uranus.
properties.extension: 93. 镎 Np：镎是首个超铀元素，常见氧化态为+5（NpO₂⁺，绿色）与+4（Np⁴⁺，黄绿色）。²³⁷Np（半衰期214万年）是核废料长期放射性主要贡献者之一。其化学性质介于铀与钚之间，研究主要用于核燃料循环与分离工艺。

properties.summary: Plutonium is a transuranic radioactive chemical element with symbol Pu and atomic number 94. It is an actinide metal of silvery-gray appearance that tarnishes when exposed to air, and forms a dull coating when oxidized. The element normally exhibits six allotropes and four oxidation states.
properties.extension: 94. 钚 Pu：钚是核时代标志性元素，氧化态从+3至+7，其中+4最稳定（Pu⁴⁺，黄褐色）。²³⁹Pu是重要裂变材料（半衰期2.41万年），用于核武器与快堆燃料；²³⁸Pu（半衰期88年）是RTG理想热源（如旅行者号探测器）。钚化学极其复杂，其溶液易发生歧化与辐射分解，固体存在六种同素异形体，密度变化大（16-20 g/cm³）。

properties.summary: Americium is a radioactive transuranic chemical element with symbol Am and atomic number 95. This member of the actinide series is located in the periodic table under the lanthanide element europium, and thus by analogy was named after the Americas. Americium was first produced in 1944 by the group of Glenn T.Seaborg from Berkeley, California, at the metallurgical laboratory of University of Chicago.
properties.extension: 95. 镅 Am：镅以+3氧化态最稳定（Am³⁺，5f⁶，粉红色），也可形成+2（Am²⁺）、+5（AmO₂⁺）、+6（AmO₂²⁺）。²⁴¹Am（半衰期432年）发射α与低能γ，用于烟雾探测器（电离室源）与密度/厚度计。AmO₂曾作为航天RTG燃料研究。

properties.summary: Curium is a transuranic radioactive chemical element with symbol Cm and atomic number 96. This element of the actinide series was named after Marie and Pierre Curie – both were known for their research on radioactivity. Curium was first intentionally produced and identified in July 1944 by the group of Glenn T. Seaborg at the University of California, Berkeley.
properties.extension: 96. 锔 Cm：锔是首个合成时可宏观量获得的超铀元素，以+3氧化态为主（Cm³⁺，5f⁷，淡黄色）。²⁴²Cm与²⁴⁴Cm是高功率α中子源（与铍混合），用于石油测井、反应堆启动。锔化合物具强放射性自热效应（可发光），研究需极端防护。

properties.summary: Berkelium is a transuranic radioactive chemical element with symbol Bk and atomic number 97. It is a member of the actinide and transuranium element series. It is named after the city of Berkeley, California, the location of the University of California Radiation Laboratory where it was discovered in December 1949.
properties.extension: 97. 锫 Bk：锫常见氧化态为+3（Bk³⁺，5f⁸，黄绿色）与+4（Bk⁴⁺，5f⁷，橙黄色），后者是强氧化剂。其化学性质类似铈（均具稳定+4态），但研究受限于毫克级产量与短半衰期（最稳定²⁴⁷Bk半衰期1380年）。

properties.summary: Californium is a radioactive metallic chemical element with symbol Cf and atomic number 98. The element was first made in 1950 at the University of California Radiation Laboratory in Berkeley, by bombarding curium with alpha particles (helium-4 ions). It is an actinide element, the sixth transuranium element to be synthesized, and has the second-highest atomic mass of all the elements that have been produced in amounts large enough to see with the unaided eye (after einsteinium).
properties.extension: 98. 锎 Cf：锎以+3氧化态最稳定（Cf³⁺，5f⁹，绿色）。²⁵²Cf（半衰期2.65年）是强中子源（1 μg每秒释放1.7×10⁷中子），用于中子活化分析、癌症治疗（中子近距离治疗）与反应堆启动。锎化学研究多在痕量水平。

properties.summary: Einsteinium is a synthetic element with symbol Es and atomic number 99. It is the seventh transuranic element, and an actinide. Einsteinium was discovered as a component of the debris of the first hydrogen bomb explosion in 1952, and named after Albert Einstein.
properties.extension: 99. 锿 Es：锿是首个在热核爆炸产物中发现元素（1952年“常春藤麦克”试验），常见+3态（Es³⁺，5f¹⁰）。其化学性质类似镧系钬，但所有同位素半衰期短（最长²⁵²Es为472天），研究限于示踪量。

properties.summary: Fermium is a synthetic element with symbol Fm and atomic number 100. It is a member of the actinide series. It is the heaviest element that can be formed by neutron bombardment of lighter elements, and hence the last element that can be prepared in macroscopic quantities, although pure fermium metal has not yet been prepared.
properties.extension: 100. 镄 Fm：镄仅以+3氧化态存在（Fm³⁺，5f¹¹），化学行为似铒。其合成量极少（原子级别），性质多基于离子交换色谱行为推测。²⁵⁷Fm（半衰期101天）是最长寿命同位素。

properties.summary: Mendelevium is a synthetic element with chemical symbol Md (formerly Mv) and atomic number 101. A metallic radioactive transuranic element in the actinide series, it is the first element that currently cannot be produced in macroscopic quantities through neutron bombardment of lighter elements. It is the antepenultimate actinide and the ninth transuranic element.
properties.extension: 101. 钔 Md：钔是首个以个人（门捷列夫）命名元素，氧化态以+3为主（Md³⁺，5f¹²），但+2态（Md²⁺，5f¹³）因全半满稳定可能在水溶液中存在。其化学研究限于几个原子，基于快速离子交换或萃取实验。

properties.summary: Nobelium is a synthetic chemical element with symbol No and atomic number 102. It is named in honor of Alfred Nobel, the inventor of dynamite and benefactor of science. A radioactive metal, it is the tenth transuranic element and is the penultimate member of the actinide series.
properties.extension: 102. 锘 No：锘最显著特征是+2氧化态（No²⁺，5f¹⁴）在水溶液中比+3态更稳定，这是“惰性电子对效应”在锕系的体现。其化学行为类似碱土金属（尤其是镭），但所有同位素半衰期极短（最长²⁵⁹No仅58分钟）。

properties.summary: Lawrencium is a synthetic chemical element with chemical symbol Lr (formerly Lw) and atomic number 103. It is named in honor of Ernest Lawrence, inventor of the cyclotron, a device that was used to discover many artificial radioactive elements. A radioactive metal, lawrencium is the eleventh transuranic element and is also the final member of the actinide series.
properties.extension: 103. 铹 Lr：铹是最后一个锕系元素，电子构型推测为[Rn]5f¹⁴7s²7p¹？实际排布仍有争议。其氧化态可能以+3为主（Lr³⁺），但离子半径极小，化学性质类似镥。合成仅原子级别，半衰期以秒计（²⁶⁶Lr约11小时），研究几乎全为物理性质。

properties.summary: Rutherfordium is a chemical element with symbol Rf and atomic number 104, named in honor of physicist Ernest Rutherford. It is a synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature) and radioactive; the most stable known isotope, 267Rf, has a half-life of approximately 1.3 hours. In the periodic table of the elements, it is a d - block element and the second of the fourth - row transition elements.

Dubnium is a chemical element with symbol Db and atomic number 105. It is named after the town of Dubna in Russia (north of Moscow), where it was first produced. It is a synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature) and radioactive; the most stable known isotope, dubnium-268, has a half-life of approximately 28 hours.

Seaborgium is a synthetic element with symbol Sg and atomic number 106. Its most stable isotope 271Sg has a half-life of 1.9 minutes. A more recently discovered isotope 269Sg has a potentially slightly longer half-life (ca.

Bohrium is a chemical element with symbol Bh and atomic number 107. It is named after Danish physicist Niels Bohr. It is a synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature) and radioactive; the most stable known isotope, 270Bh, has a half-life of approximately 61 seconds.

Hassium is a chemical element with symbol Hs and atomic number 108, named after the German state of Hesse. It is a synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature) and radioactive; the most stable known isotope, 269Hs, has a half-life of approximately 9.7 seconds, although an unconfirmed metastable state, 277mHs, may have a longer half-life of about 130 seconds. More than 100 atoms of hassium have been synthesized to date.

Meitnerium is a chemical element with symbol Mt and atomic number 109. It is an extremely radioactive synthetic element (an element not found in nature that can be created in a laboratory). The most stable known isotope, meitnerium-278, has a half-life of 7.6 seconds.

Darmstadtium is a chemical element with symbol Ds and atomic number 110. It is an extremely radioactive synthetic element. The most stable known isotope, darmstadtium-281, has a half-life of approximately 10 seconds.

Roentgenium is a chemical element with symbol Rg and atomic number 111. It is an extremely radioactive synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature); the most stable known isotope, roentgenium-282, has a half-life of 2.1 minutes. Roentgenium was first created in 1994 by the GSI Helmholtz Centre for Heavy Ion Research near Darmstadt, Germany.

Copernicium is a chemical element with symbol Cn and atomic number 112. It is an extremely radioactive synthetic element that can only be created in a laboratory. The most stable known isotope, copernicium-285, has a half-life of approximately 29 seconds, but it is possible that this copernicium isotope may have a nuclear isomer with a longer half-life, 8.9 min.

Nihonium is a chemical element with atomic number 113. It has a symbol Nh. It is a synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature) and is extremely radioactive; its most stable known isotope, nihonium-286, has a half-life of 20 seconds.

Flerovium is a superheavy artificial chemical element with symbol Fl and atomic number 114. It is an extremely radioactive synthetic element. The element is named after the Flerov Laboratory of Nuclear Reactions of the Joint Institute for Nuclear Research in Dubna, Russia, where the element was discovered in 1998.

Moscovium is the name of a synthetic superheavy element in the periodic table that has the symbol Mc and has the atomic number 115. It is an extremely radioactive element; its most stable known isotope, moscovium-289, has a half-life of only 220 milliseconds. It is also known as eka-bismuth or simply element 115.

Livermorium is a synthetic superheavy element with symbol Lv and atomic number 116. It is an extremely radioactive element that has only been created in the laboratory and has not been observed in nature. The element is named after the Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory in the United States, which collaborated with the Joint Institute for Nuclear Research in Dubna, Russia to discover livermorium in 2000.

Tennessine is a superheavy artificial chemical element with an atomic number of 117 and a symbol of Ts. Also known as eka-astatine or element 117, it is the second-heaviest known element and penultimate element of the 7th period of the periodic table. As of 2016, fifteen tennessine atoms have been observed: six when it was first synthesized in 2010, seven in 2012, and two in 2014.

Oganesson is IUPAC's name for the transactinide element with the atomic number 118 and element symbol Og. It is also known as eka-radon or element 118, and on the periodic table of the elements it is a p-block element and the last one of the 7th period. Oganesson is currently the only synthetic member of group 18.
